creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: woman's vest; front is dark green wool with gold metallic and maroon thread design; red balls along left side with maroon hooks on right side to clasp over; inside lining is off-white cotton fabric; sides of vest have a strip of black cloth and orange cloth; back of vest is red cloth with a center strip of orange (same color as the sides); back center of neckline is dark blue
title: Woman's waistcoat
